The CR chamber door opens, and out steps a bot....a rhyming bot....a but of=
 such courage that he was willing to kill himself for his friends...one of =
split personalities.....one of....bad rhymes......it was Suukie, excpet now=
, he was a much darker bot...one with an evil face expression that never ch=
anged......one that now should be forever known, as The Artist Formerly Kno=
wn As Suukie!.......Tafkas!...... (please change that, Yanshosh) he walked =
out to help his Maximal comrades..........
